article_title: FreeFile, Other Options Still Available For Taxpayers On Extension

article_metadata.description: With less than two weeks to go until the October 15 deadline, nearly a quarter of the 13 million taxpayers who requested an automatic extension this year have not yet filed. Here's what you need to know about filing on extension.
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb
